# trackTintColor

**Instance Property**

The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that isn’t filled.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var trackTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you set [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView/trackTintColor] to `nil`, the track uses the tint of its parent.

## Configuring the progress bar

- **progressViewStyle**: The current graphical style of the progress view.
- **progressTintColor**: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that’s filled.
- **progressImage**: An image to use for the portion of the progress bar that’s filled.
- **trackImage**: An image to use for the portion of the track that isn’t filled.
